title: Insurance Code
context: [ยง431:10E-152] Extended coverage. Insurers seeking to provide multi-peril coverage for residential property after July 1, 2016, shall submit to the commissioner a written request for permission to write the coverage. The commissioner may disapprove the request. If the request is disapproved, the insurer shall not write the coverage. [L 2016, c 141, pt of ยง1]
